title: Paradox
description: Meet Gregory, an artificial intelligence unlike anything the world's ever seen before. His impact onto society has been by analyzing the answers given to just 12 questions, he will tell you how you will die. When Ryan Downs gets a death prediction like no other, he learns entire shadow groups exist solely to find out just how Paradox and Gregory's other fantastical predictions will come to pass.
author: Aaron Crocco
